angle_rationale: This angle exposes how both stories reveal the troubling trend of turning basic human needs—fertility preservation for cancer survivors and safe working conditions for garment workers—into market opportunities. It highlights the power dynamics where those who can afford to 'solve' these problems profit, while the underlying systemic issues remain unaddressed. This lens reveals the uncomfortable truth about how capitalism transforms human suffering into business models.
